items.content_html: I18XS is a highly efficient, 3kb i18n solution for JavaScript and Node.js, suitable for performance-focused developers. Compatible with TypeScript and JavaScript, it's ideal for modern, lightweight applications, boasting ESM compatibility and powerful functionality despite its small size.

items.content_html: EnergySaver.js is a lightweight, easy-to-integrate JavaScript library designed to provide real-time energy consumption estimates based on the theme (dark or light) used on a website. It visually represents the estimated energy savings of using a dark theme over a light theme, enhancing user awareness about energy-efficient practices
